Question: On January 10, 1956, this person made his first recordings for RCA in Nashville.

Parker had already shifted his plans to television, where this person had not appeared since the Sinatra Timex show in 1960.
He was on the verge of quitting, until this person ordered the Hill and Range personnel out of the studio.
